programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.(n)

programme.title: Eesti mäng
programme.desc: Täna astuvad üles selle aasta teatriauhindade jagamisel parima meespeaosalise auhinna pälvinud Karol Kuntsel, EOK sportlaskomisjoni esimees, kettaheite olümpiavõitja Gerd Kanter ja tippkokk Angelica Udeküll. Saatejuht Gaute Kivistik, režissöör Maire Radsin.(n)

programme.title: Pulss
programme.desc: Maxil ja Jessel on ühine vaenlane. Toni esitab Johannale ultimaatumi. Ilmari võtab julguse kokku, et eluga edasi minna.(n)

programme.title: Uudishimu tippkeskus
programme.sub-title: Miks pöörata tagasi Vargamäe Andrese tehtut?
programme.desc: Maastik peidab endas jälgi meie esivanemate kätetööst. Kunagised suured sood on kraavitatud ja kuivendatud – meie teame neid paiku põldude ja karjamaadena. Keskkonnakriisi ajastul nähakse asju aga teisiti. Kuidas hapraid ökosüsteeme taastada? Saatejuhid Maarja Merivoo-Parro ja Karl Vilhelm Valter, režissöör Margo Siimon, tootja Filmit OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Riittal ja Tomil on käes aasta viimane päev järvel. Sanna ja Antti on jänesejahil. Manu testib põhjapõdrajahil uut abivahendit. Riikka koer Hippu pannakse ajujahil proovile.(n)

programme.title: TeadusEST
programme.desc: Viirused ja bakterid seostuvad enamusele meist vaid ohtlike haigustekitajatega, kuid teadlase pilgule on nad ka põnevad masinavärgid, mille uurimine on juba praegu toonud inimkonnale tohutuid arenguhüppeid. Seekordses saates sukeldume maailma, kus mikroobid aitavad luua supertaimi, leida uudseid ravimeid ja õpetavad inimestele koostööd. Saatejuht-toimetaja Piret Järvis-Milder, toimetaja Kaur Maran, režissöör Liis Lindmaa, produtsent Anatoli Tafitšuk, tootja Ulm Production. Saade valmib koostöös Eesti Teadusagentuuriga.(n)

programme.title: Rico, Oskar ja varikujud
Rico, Oskar und die Tieferschatten
programme.desc: 10-aastane Rico nimetab end ise süva-andekaks, tegelikult on tal raskusi meeldejätmisega, mistõttu salvestab ta kõik olulise vanale kasettmakile. Tema hobiks on läikivate paberite kogumine tänavalt. Ühel päeval kohtub ta Oskariga, kes on jällegi üliandekas, teab tohutult igasugu fakte, ent samas on kartlik ja kannab igaks juhuks pidevalt kiivrit. Poisid, kes on mõlemad omamoodi veidrikud ja üksikud, saavad sõpradeks. Samal ajal tegutseb Berliinis lasteröövel hüüdnimega Mister 2000, kuna ta nõuab röövitud laste eest 2000 eurot lunaraha. Rico, kes on märganud hoovimaja tühjas korteris kummalisi varje, kahtlustab, et äkki hoitakse seal röövitud lapsi. Poisid otsustavad koos asja uurima hakata, ent siis kaob Oskar ja Ricol tuleb üksi tegutsema asuda.(n)

programme.title: Läbi ja lõhki Coco New Yorgis
100% Coco New York
programme.desc: Koolikaaslaste seas oma vlogiga kuulsust kogunud Coco võidab ootamatult stipendiumi ühele New Yorgi suvisele moekoolitusele. Üks on kindel: see suvi tõotab tulla unustamatu!(n)

programme.title: Nöps ja Mikk
programme.desc: Sõbrad meisterdavad Helgile sünnipäevaks maailma ägedaimat juukseklambrit, kuid kõik koguvad nii palju erinevaid asju, et Nöps ei oska meisterdamist millestki alustadagi. Kuna Helgi kardab, et sõbrad unustasid tema sünnipäeva ära, peab Nöps kiirelt leidma üllatuse, mis Helgile meeldiks.(n)

programme.desc: Liselotte nägi koletist ja asus temaga võitlusse, aga kas see ikka oli koletis?(n)

programme.desc: Bob Roth otsib uusi talente ja Marinette'i arvates on Kiisubändil õige aeg lagedale tulla. Kahjuks aga pole XY ja Bob Roth ausad ning varastavad noorte idee.(n)

programme.title: Rakett 69
programme.desc: Noorte teaduskonkurss Rakett 69 stardib juba 13. lennuga! Suur seiklus algab teaduslabürindist, kus võistlusesse pürgijad lahendavad neli ülesannet, et näidata oma teadmisi, nupukust ja särtsakust. Sel hooajal pääsevad teadusstipendumi nimel võistlema vaid 12 kõige lootusrikkamat tulevikutegijat. Tootja Vesilind OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Äijä viib oma sõbratari Elsa romantilisele tundramatkale. Manu paneb Lempäälä haugide huumorisoone proovile, Riikka jahib tuttavas seltskonnas jänest. Riitta pääseb Tomi mootorsaanikoolitusele.(n)

programme.title: Sõda kohtupingis
programme.desc: Endise Jugoslaavia asjade rahvusvaheline kriminaalkohus oli ainulaadne eksperiment. Esimest korda pidid sõltumatu kohtu ette astuma kõik sõjakuritegudes süüdistatud isikud olenemata sellest, kelle poolel nad võitlesid. Rohkem kui 20 aasta jooksul mõisteti kohut 160 inimese üle. Nii paljastus muu hulgas ka tõde Srebrenica genotsiidi kohta. Paraku pole endise Jugoslaavia rahvad siiani ära leppinud ja ka lootus, et rahvusvaheline õigus igas olukorras võidu saavutab, jääb endiselt utoopia valda.(n)

programme.title: Kaduva maailma lävel
programme.desc: Ebapärlikarp on puhta keskkonna tunnusliik, kes on eksisteerinud üle 200 miljoni aasta ja elanud üle kõik varasemad planeedi jahenemised ning soojenemised. Kuigi veel möödunud sajandil leidus meil ebapärlikarpe ka Lõuna-Eesti jõgedes, siis praegu on alles vaid üks väheneva arvukusega asurkond Põhja-Eestis. Nende hääbumine on selge hoiatus keskkonnaseisundi halvenemisest viimase 50 aasta jooksul. Ebapärlikarbi elust ja erilisusest räägib bioloog Katrin Kaldma, kes on pühendunud nende imeliste karpide päästmisele.(n)

programme.title: 8 mm ELU
programme.desc: “8 mm ELU” seikleb salapärasel maal nimega Välis-Eesti. On aeg oma silmaga vaadata, kuidas Külma sõja ajal üle kogu maailma eesti elu õigupoolest elati. Menüüs on hõrgud ja haruldased kaadrid põgenemisest pereeluni, koorilaulust karnevalideni, Kanadast Austraaliani. Saatejuht Tambet Tuisk, autor Maarja Merivoo-Parro, produtsent Kaidor Kahar.(n)

programme.title: Kirjandusministri juures. Muusika eri
programme.desc: Kirjandusministri juures on Eestile ainukese Eurovisiooni lauluvõistluse võidu toonud laulu sõnade autor ja laulukirjutaja Maian Kärmas. Saatejuht Mart Juur, toimetaja Tauno Vahter, režissöör Maire Radsin, produtsendid Erle Loonurm ja Janno-Hans Arro.(n)

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A struggling true crime author moves his family into a new home and finds a box of old film reels in the dusty attic. What he discovers are disturbing snuff films that put his family in danger of a paranormal evil.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: Follows the relentless efforts of the crypto-zoological agency, as it faces off against a group of enormous monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah , leaving humanity to an unknown fate.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: As a man heads to outer space to prevent a climate-controlled satellite network from triggering a devastating storm that has protected the planet from many natural disasters for three years, his brother tries to kidnap the US president to force him to resolve the crisis.

programme.title: The First Wives Club
programme.desc: Brought together at the funeral, three college friends discover that they suffer from the same dilemma: they have put their blood, sweat, and tears in building up their husbands, only for their husbands to leave them for younger women. But now it's their turn to make the husbands regret it.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker and Gwen have been together since high school. Peter discovers a mysterious briefcase that used to be his father's, and when he decides to investigate, he is drawn into a world that makes a super-hero out of him. He fights evil in all its forms, with his super abilities that have generated thanks to a genetically-modified spider's bite.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: With the appearance of Electro, Spider-Man must confront an enemy far more powerful than he. And as his old friend, Harry Osborn, returns, Peter Parker comes to realize that all of his enemies have one thing in common: OsCorp.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
programme.desc: Peter Parker and his friends go on a summer break to Europe, where Peter finds himself trying to save his friends from the evil hands of Mysterio.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Torn between his allegiance to two different worlds, Hellboy struggles with the fact that accepting his real heritage might lead to an apocalypse, all while resisting the machinations of a witch intent on destroying the world.

programme.title: Ender's Game
programme.desc: Seventy years after a horrific war with aliens, an exceptionally gifted child is sent to an advanced military school in space to prepare for the future invasion.

programme.desc: As Brad and Dusty finally learned how to get along, they face a new challenge when their intrusive dads come to visit during Christmas.

programme.desc: Arthur ( Russell Brand), a drunken playboy is forced by his mother to marry the successful businesswoman Susan or he will lose his inheritance. But he meets the outgoing girl Naomi, he thinks that she's the one, and he has to choose between love or fortune.

programme.desc: Mac and Kelly Radner are a young couple with a newborn daughter, Stella, having high hopes in their new life. But soon their life takes an unexpected turn after they are forced to live next to a fraternity house.

programme.desc: Two students who share the same music taste find each other when Nora asks Nick to pretend to be her boyfriend for 5 minutes, unaware that he is the person whose CDs she has been listening to. A search for Norah's drunken best friend brings the two together.(n)

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: After a global blackout, a struggling musician shockingly discovers that he’s the only person on earth who remembers the world renowned music band, The Beatles.(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: Coming from nothing, Phineas Taylor Barnum has always dreamed of rising to the top and introducing the world to innovative art. But when he finally realizes his dream of opening a circus that turns into a sensation, he starts to lose sight of what's really important to him.(n)

programme.title: Les Misérables
programme.desc: "The Miserables" revolves around Jean Valjean who was imprisoned for twenty years for stealing a loaf of bread. He escapes from prison and tries to start a new life as an honest man. Unfortunately he can't get rid of the belligerent policeman Javert who hunts him down. Valjean also decides to take care of the young orphaned Cosette, changing their lives forever.(n)

programme.title: Ouija 2: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967, a widowed mother tries to add authenticity to her hoax spiritual readings through a Ouija board. Unbeknownst to her and her two daughters, they end up inviting an evil entity into their lives, which begins to get hold of the youngest daughter.(n)

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: Theodore Twombly (Joaquin Phoenix) is a complex, soulful and lonely writer who has just come out of a relationship heartbroken. He gets involved in a friendship with an advanced operating system impersonating Samantha (Scarlett Johansson), which eventually turns into a romance.

programme.title: Colombiana
programme.desc: In 1992 Bogota, a small girl Cataleya, witnesses the murder of her parents by one of the terrorists' bands. Her uncle Emilio, helps her to recover and teaches her to take revenge from her parents killers. After getting prepared and trained on different sorts of weapons Cataleya starts planning for payback.

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: When he is sent on a debt-collecting mission in Hollywood, the gangster Chili Palmer gets a surprising offer to join the entertainment industry. He soon discovers that the world of Hollywood has its similarities to the world of mobsters.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
programme.desc: Secret CIA agent Jack Ryan (Chris Pine) discovers a Russian conspiracy of a terrorist attack intended to collapse the US economy and hit Wall Street. Jack takes the task of protecting his country even if it costs him his life.

programme.title: Celeste and Jesse Forever
programme.desc: Best-friends-turned-married couple Celeste and Jesse married young. They begin to drift apart as they grow up until Celeste decides that getting a divorce is better for them. Hoping to preserve their friendship, Celeste has second thoughts when Jesse starts getting serious with another woman.

programme.title: The Words
programme.desc: An ambitious writer achieves fame when he pens the next great American novel. His secret? The story isn't his. He soon realizes the cost of his success is much higher than expected when he has to live up to his plagiarism.

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: In the wake of his brother's suicide, Tyler's family splinters off under the pressure of their trauma. When he meets Ally, they find solace for their individual familial troubles in each other's arms. Love is born amid tragedy as both Ally and Tyler change each other's lives.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: As they form an unexpected friendship on the night of their college graduation, Emma and Dexter make a pact to meet yearly on the anniversary of the day they met. For 18 years, they keep their promise, sharing their triumphs and failure, until they realize that they may have been looking for each other all along.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Special forces soldier John falls in love with Savannah at first sight, while on vacation in his hometown. They both know that John will be back in the military in the future, and the September 11th attacks cause him to go back soon. Things then get complicated between them and their relationship almost reaches breaking point. Is their love strong enough to survive.

programme.desc: The Addams family finds their home in danger when a reality TV star labels their eerie mansion as a threat to the picture-perfect community she is trying to build. As she employs every mean to get rid of them, the Addams family must fight to save their home.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: In a world inhabited by emojis, Gene feels like the odd one out as he is the one emoji who could change his expression, whereas the rest of his brethren can only have one expression. But when he sabotages a message that his user Alex sends out, he has to confront the ramifications of being him.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: The life of the foster child Billy Batson changes forever after the ancient wizard Shazam grants him the power to transform into an adult superhero, only to find himself chased by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana who is after his newfound powers.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Born to a human father and an Atlantean mother, Arthur Curry is forced to step into his role as heir to Atlantis to prevent war from breaking out between the two worlds he belongs to.

programme.title: If Beale Street Could Talk
programme.desc: (Tish), a woman in Harlem, struggles desperately to prove her lover innocence of a rape crime he was falsely accused of ,while being pregnant with their first child. programme.desc: Dracula runs a high-end resort for monsters far away from the human world. The Count's monster-haven bubble is burst when a boy named Jonathan stumbles upon his resort and falls in love with his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: As Peter Rabbit and his sisters enjoy sneaking into Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden, things get complicated when his nephew, Thomas, moves into his house and sets out to get rid of the rabbits.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: After his arrest with the help of Newt Scamander, Grindelwald manages to escape from the grip of the Magical Congress of the United States of America and sets out to gather his followers. Albus Dumbledore decides to enlist Scamander in order to defeat this upcoming danger.(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In the distant future, robots are created to help humans with their daily tasks. Detective Del Spooner begins to investigate the murder of a leading robotics scientist and discovers that a robot named Sonny is involved. He has to protect the fate of humans, and reconcile between them and the robots.

programme.title: The Masked Saint
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Pastor Chris who tries to help his community by returning to his old life as a wrestler, only to find himself torn between helping others and risking the exposure of his identity which he tried hard to hide.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In a dystopian post-apocalyptic future in the nation of Panem, Katniss Everdeen (Lawrence) volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, where boys and girls between the ages of 12 and 18 are required to fight to death in a televised annual event until there is one remaining who will be crowned the victor.

programme.title: The Man with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Set in feudal China, where a hunt for a treasure of gold takes place between a group of murderers ,warriors and a British soldier in a remote village,where a simple blacksmith tries to defend himself and his fellow residents.

programme.title: Legacy of Lies
programme.desc: After retiring from his work in MI6, former agent Martin Baxter is thrust back into his old dangerous life, as he joins forces with a Ukrainian journalist to uncover a conspiracy that is connected to Russian covert operations.

programme.desc: When Thomas wakes up in the lift, the only thing he can remember is his first name. programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: In the fourth Jason Bourne feature film, a unique agent, Aaron Cross, is enrolled in an enhanced US Defense Department black ops program "Operation Outcome". Agents are given chemical pills to genetically amplify their abilities. After the older programs are publicly exposed, CIA directors are investigated followed by a decision to shut down Outcome and eliminate all its agents and scientists.
